_sText:
This is a beta release of gg_yellowrock.  I wanted to get some feedback about layout/balance before adding in details and lighting and stuff like that.

No .nav file included in this version, sorry for the inconvenience.

There are buyzones in the map for testing balance with different guns without the Gun Game mod on.

to do:
Lighting
Trim and texture alignment on the arches
Better .nav file
Improve displacements

I would really appreciate any feedback concerning layout, balance, possible exploits, and other things of this nature.  Due to some computer problems I am having, this version has not been tested very much.

added in temporary lighting

UPDATE:
added in some props
made a brazier in the central area
added playerclip in some vital areas

apologies for the low quality of the screenshots.
